title: Germany at the 2014 Winter Paralympics
text:
<a href="Germany">Germany</a> competed at the <a href="2014%20Winter%20Paralympics">2014 Winter Paralympics</a> in <a href="Sochi">Sochi</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, held between 7–16 March 2014.
During the games, Germany has a "German House", that is located in the village of <a href="Estosadok">Estosadok</a>, on the <a href="Mzymta%20River">Mzymta River</a>, upstream from <a href="Krasnaya%20Polyana%2C%20Sochi%2C%20Krasnodar%20Krai">Krasnaya Polyana (Mountain Cluster)</a>.
Alpine skiing.
Germany has entered seven athletes in alpine skiing. In the combined, the first run is the slalom, the second is the super-G.
Snowboarding.
Para-snowboarding is making its debut at the Winter Paralympics and it will be placed under the Alpine skiing program during the 2014 Games.
Biathlon.
Men
Women
Cross-country skiing.
Men
Women
Relay
